duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and direct store colleagues to optimize the customer experience and support sales volume.
Manage customer service issues and flow throughout the building, reassigning resources as needed.
Lead store activities to ensure customer readiness and exceptional presentation standards.
Role model ability to build lasting customer relationships, provide fast-feedback, and redirection to foster the same behaviors.
Execute store opening and closing procedures, manage workload reports, and lead a process if necessary.
Build a proactive and solution-oriented customer-centric culture in the store to ensure consistent customer experiences.
Oversee colleague execution and completion of daily Fulfillment responsibilities, provide feedback, and contribute observations.
Have practical knowledge of store systems and assist colleagues with timekeeping issues.
Resolve employee relations issues and maintain regular, dependable attendance and punctuality.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent required
